org.deri.cqels.engine

Interface OpRouter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BDBGraphPatternRouter, ContinuousConstruct, ContinuousSelect, ExtendRouter, FilterExprRouter, GroupRouter, IndexedTripleRouter, JoinRouter, OpRouter1, OpRouter2, OpRouterBase, ProjectRouter, ThroughRouter

    public interface OpRouter
    This interface contains the behaviours of a router which is responsible to receive a mapping and route it to the higher node in the router-node tree

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MappingIterator getBuff()
      Each specific router contains a data buffer in the form of mappings This method will get that data buffer out
      int getId()
      Each specific router has a unique Id This method will get that Id out
      Op getOp()
      Each specific router contains an operator what is parsed from the query This method will get that op out
      void route(Mapping mapping)
      This method route the specified mapping to higher node in the router-node tree
      MappingIterator searchBuff4Match(Mapping mapping)
      This method tries to search in the data mapping buffer whether there is any mapping that matches the specified mapping.

    • Method Detail

      • getOp

        Op getOp()
        Each specific router contains an operator what is parsed from the query This method will get that op out

      • getBuff

        MappingIterator getBuff()
        Each specific router contains a data buffer in the form of mappings This method will get that data buffer out

      • searchBuff4Match

        MappingIterator searchBuff4Match(Mapping mapping)
        This method tries to search in the data mapping buffer whether there is any mapping that matches the specified mapping.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the specified mapping
        Returns:
        a mapping iterator of matched mappings in buffer

      • route

        void route(Mapping mapping)
        This method route the specified mapping to higher node in the router-node tree
        Parameters:
        mapping - the specified mapping

      • getId

        int getId()
        Each specific router has a unique Id This method will get that Id out
